title: Introducing: Det Lilla Extra
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/hamish-900x394.jpg "hamish")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/5528-introducing-det-lilla-extra/attachment/hamish)

Det Lilla Extra are from Umeå in Sweden, but apart from that almost nothing is known about them. Their music is an odd beast. Part ‘witch house’, part drone and part synth-pop, the tunes that have been released so far create something that’s quietly unnerving. All we have so far is two tracks that you can listen to bellow. Expect another article as soon as more material is released.

 [planer för livet](http://soundcloud.com/detlillaextra/planer-f-r-livet) by [detlillaextra](http://soundcloud.com/detlillaextra)  
[](http://www.wearerebels.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Planer-För-Livet.mp3)

[Download Planer För Livet](http://www.wearerebels.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/Planer-För-Livet.mp3)

 [vad som helst](http://soundcloud.com/detlillaextra/vad-som-helst) by [detlillaextra](http://soundcloud.com/detlillaextra)
